comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of math workbooks to be made
- \( y \): number of English workbooks to be made

Constraints:
- \( x \geq 40 \): at least 40 math workbooks must be made
- \( y \geq 60 \): at least 60 English workbooks must be made
- \( x \leq 140 \): at most 140 math workbooks can be made
- \( y \leq 170 \): at most 170 English workbooks can be made
- \( x + y \geq 200 \): at least 200 workbooks of either type must be made

Objective:
Maximize profit: \( 15x + 17y \)
